sentences.en: Does your electric blanket conform to BS 3456?
sentences.cn: 你们的电热毯达到英国的3456标准了吗？

sentences.en: Her ideas do not conform with mine.
sentences.cn: 她的观点与我的不一致.

sentences.en: I am well aware that we all conform to one stereotype or another.
sentences.cn: 我们所有人都能找到某种与自己相似的模式化形象，这一点我很清楚。

sentences.en: It did not conform to the usual stereotype of an industrial city.
sentences.cn: 这和一座常规的工业城市那种千篇一律的格局不一样。

sentences.en: It is a solid, proven solution for adopting multiple standards -- whether your goal is to conform to the law or to improve your business practices.
sentences.cn: 它是一个坚固的、已经证实采用多个标准的解决方案，不管你的目标是遵守法律还是改善你的商业实践。

sentences.en: Joseph does not conform to the stereotype of a policeman.
sentences.cn: 约瑟夫不同于人们一般印象中的警察形象。

sentences.en: Like most "peacetime wars" it did not conform to preconceived ideas.
sentences.cn: 如同大多数“和平时代的战争”一样，这与我们的预想不同。

sentences.en: Many children who can't or don't conform are often bullied.
sentences.cn: 很多不能或不按规矩行事的小孩常常被人欺负。

sentences.en: Relations of production must conform to the level of productive forces.
sentences.cn: 生产关系必须适合生产力.

sentences.en: Students can be expelled for refusing to conform to school rules.
sentences.cn: 学生不遵守校规可能会被开除。

sentences.en: Taxis must conform to the rigorous standards laid down by the police.
sentences.cn: 出租车必须遵守警方的严格规定。

sentences.en: The building does not conform to safety regulations.
sentences.cn: 这座建筑物不符合安全条例.

sentences.en: The building does not conform with safety regulations.
sentences.cn: 例句：这座建筑物不符合安全条例。

sentences.en: The couple idea is certainly oversold. There's so much pressure to become a couple that people feel failure if they don't conform.
sentences.cn: 结婚的观念无疑被过分渲染了。人们面临来自各方的结婚压力，不结婚对他们来说就是一种失败。

sentences.en: The lamp has been designed to conform to new safety standards.
sentences.cn: 该灯设计得符合新的安全标准。

sentences.en: The meat market can continue only if it is radically overhauled to conform with strict European standards.
sentences.cn: 肉类市场只有经过彻底的大检查，严格遵守欧洲标准，才能继续营业。

sentences.en: The Night Rider lamp has been designed to conform to new British Standard safety requirements.
sentences.cn: “夜行者”灯的设计符合新的英国安全标准的要求。

sentences.en: The packaging does not conform to EU rules.
sentences.cn: 这种包装不符合欧盟规定.

sentences.en: the pressure on schoolchildren to conform
sentences.cn: 小学生要顺应社会的压力

sentences.en: There is considerable pressure on teenagers to conform.
sentences.cn: 年轻人被大力要求守规矩。

sentences.en: They want me to conform, to be lily-white.
sentences.cn: 他们要我循规蹈矩，要我清白无瑕。

sentences.en: This sketch does not conform with the specifications.
sentences.cn: 图文不符.

words.tran_cn: 因循守旧；盲从因袭的态度

trans.tran_cn: 遵守，符合，一致，顺应（大多数人或社会）
trans.tran_en: to obey a law, rule etc
to obey a law, rule etc
